default.name: strategy_plan_portfolio_execute_improve
default.label: Strategy → Plan → Portfolio → Execute → Improve
default.description: When the enterprise needs to change or steer the business, we align strategy, portfolio, and execution so the organization delivers the right work and continuously learns and adjusts.
value_metrics: Time from strategy decision to first value

default.name: design_build_secure_release_operate
default.label: Design → Build → Secure → Release → Operate
default.description: When a product, feature, or change is needed, we design, build, secure, release, and operate it so customers get reliable, secure products and platforms that keep improving.

default.name: market_sell_order_fulfill_bill_recognize
default.label: Market → Sell → Order → Fulfill → Bill → Recognize
default.description: When a potential customer shows intent, we orchestrate the end-to-end lead-to-cash journey to turn that intent into profitable, compliant revenue and a durable relationship.

default.name: workforce_lifecycle_acquire_enable_work_develop_pay_analyze
default.label: Workforce Lifecycle: Acquire → Enable → Work → Develop → Pay → Analyze
default.description: When a work need or role exists or changes, we plan, acquire, enable, organize, develop, and reward people so we have a sustainable, productive workforce aligned to strategy and economics.

default.name: protect_comply_govern_assure_recover
default.label: Protect → Comply → Govern → Assure → Recover
default.description: Because the enterprise faces constant risks and obligations, we protect, comply, govern, assure, and recover so we operate within risk appetite, meet obligations, and withstand disruptions.
value_metrics: Time to detect and remediate incidents
